vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13;
son of: Abihail (H0032I);
brother of: Michael (H4317H), Meshullam (H4918I), Sheba (H7652), Jorai (H3140), Zia (H2127) and Eber (H5677H)
§ Jachan = "troublesome"
one of seven chief men of the tribe of Gad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅干 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "麻煩的"
一名迦得人 (代上 5:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅干 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "麻烦的"
一名迦得人 (代上 5:13)
